TopicTitle: Addon to change SIMULATE_IN_BACKGROUND while ingame?

Articles.Content:
Hi,

I'm looking for an addon - or another way - to switch "SIMULATE_IN_BACKGROUND" without restarting the game.

I normally want to TAB out of the game and have it in the background so that I do not have to start it when I want to play, but sometimes I would like to continue running the game when tabbing out, because I don't want to sit there waiting for a long burn.

Is there an addon that lets me switch that?
Running the game in Windowed mode should resolve this issue. No addon required.

Not for me unfortunately. I have the problem that my explorer replacement (speedcommander) gets its focus stolen by KSP after opening irfan view in fullscreen and closing it again - pretty specific problem but nothing I can change about it (as far as I know).

That's why I need something that lets me switch the setting for KSP while being ingame.

Found a small workaround if anyone has the same problem; processexplorer (from sysinternals/ms) can suspend a program.

Some addon to do this would be nice though.
